strategy: Harlequin armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Aspect Warrior formations, Titans, and the Avatar have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Craftworld Lugganath, with Corsair support and Harlequin allies from the Masque of the Veiled Path.

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

sections.name: Craftworld Lugganath Hosts
sections.description: One Aspect Warrior Warhost per Guardian Warhost

formations.name: Aspect Warrior Warhost
formations.units: Any four of either Dire Avengers or Dark Reapers, two Wave Serpents
upgrades: Exarch, Autarch, May exchange two Wave Serpents for four Falcons: 75 points

sections.name: Craftworld Lugganath Troupes
sections.description: Up to two for each 'Lugganath Hosts' taken

formations.name: Engine of Vaul
formations.units: Any one of the following units: Cobra, Storm Serpent
upgrades: Add up to any two of the following units for 200 points each: Cobra, Storm Serpent

sections.name: Harlequin Saedaths
sections.description: Up to one for each 'Lugganath Hosts' taken

formations.name: 0-1 Serpent's Blood
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, four Harlequin Skyweavers, two Voidweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Cegorath's Revenge
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, four Harlequin Troupes, two Death Jesters, six Starweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Isha's Tears
formations.units: One Harlequin Avatar, one Shadowseer, four Death Jesters, two Harlequin Troupes, six Starweavers

formations.name: 0-1 Dance Without End
formations.units: One Harelquin Avatar, one Shadowseer, one Solitaire, two Death Jesters, two Mimes, three Harlequin Troupes, eight Starweavers

sections.name: Craftworld Lugganath Aircraft, Spacecraft and Titans
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Autarch
items.description: Add an Eldar Autarch character. (1 per army)

items.name: Exarch
items.description: Add one Eldar Exarch character to an Eldar Aspect Warrior unit

items.name: Firestorm
items.description: Replace one Falcon with a Firestorm

items.name: Farseer
items.description: Add one Farseer character to a Guardian unit

items.name: Windriders
items.description: Add up to six Lugganath Jetbikes to the formation
